package.name: Avenue Clothing Demo Store for uCommerce 7 - Accelerator 5.0.5.18121

info.readme: Thank you for installing the uCommerce accelerator. By default this package will install an example store structure, Razor templates, settings, categories and products.

home.content:
Welcome to Avenue Clothing

This is an example store which runs on uCommerce. It is designed to demonstrate some of the functionality that comes out-of-the-box and help developers get started with the awesome feature rich e-commerce package for Umbraco.
